products.name: Nike Women's Alphafly 3 Road Racing Shoes in Yellow, Size: 5 | FD8315-700
products.brandedName: Nike Women's Alphafly 3 Road Racing Shoes in Yellow, Size: 5 | FD8315-700
products.unbrandedName: Women's Alphafly 3 Road Racing Shoes in Yellow, Size: 5 | FD8315-700
products.description: Fine-tuned for marathon speed, the Alphafly 3 helps push you beyond what you thought possible. Three innovative technologies power your run: A double dose of Air Zoom units helps launch you into your next step; a full-length carbon fiber plate helps propel you forward with ease; and a heel-to-toe ZoomX foam midsole helps keep you fresh from start to 26.2. Time to leave your old personal records in the dust. Energy Return for Your Marathon:Two forefoot Air Zoom units combine with ZoomX foam to store and return the energy back to you, powering every step. Propulsive Feeling:A full-length carbon fiber plate delivers a propulsive sensation that helps you smoothly transition through every stride and tackle turns with confidence. Cushioned Ride:Fully connected ZoomX foam creates an ultralight and cushioned feel, helping you stay fresh and comfortable from mile 1 to 26.2. What's New About the Alphafly 3?:The Alphafly 3 is our lightest Alphafly ever, featuring a slightly wider carbon fiber plate for increased stability, a fully connected ZoomX foam midsole for smoother transitions and an all-new Atomknit upper designed for improved multidirectional containment and breathability. More Benefits:Notched laces offer a secure but soft lace-up. An integrated knit tongue with lofted padding helps alleviate lace pressure. Product Details:Weight: Approx. 174g/6.1oz (Women's US 8). Heel-to-toe drop: 8mm. Style: FD8315; Color: Volt/Dusty Cactus/Total Orange/Concord; Size: 5; Gender: Female; Age Group: Adult | Nike Alphafly 3 Women's Road Racing Shoes in Yellow, Size: 5 | FD8315-700

Simple yet undeniably stylish, the adidas Originals SL 72 RS Casual Shoes embody the adidas Originals philosophy of sport-inspired design that's made for life. products.description: Creative Director Ibrahim Kamara celebrates the life and legacy of Virgil Abloh in this fantastical collection for Off-White. Building upon the late founder's initial design concept - an exploration of the human body - Kamara incorporates futuristic prints, cut outs, and stitching that highlight various anatomical areas, an imaginative approach that honors Abloh's boundary-pushing vision for the label. This mesh football T-shirt features a V-neck, short sleeves, and athletic logo detailing. V-neck Drop shoulders Short sleeves Pulls over 100% polyester Machine wash Made in Italy SIZE & FIT Model measurements: 6'2" tall, 40" chest, 31" waist Model is wearing a US size Medium ABOUT THE BRAND The late Virgil Abloh launched to fame in 2012 as the designer and CEO of Off-White, delivering an innovative, streetwear-heavy aesthetic. Blending the cool look and feel of hoodies and sweatpants with highly tailored suiting, eveningwear and separates, the label continues to cite the cultural zeitgeist as ongoing inspiration, and as a nod to Abloh's legacy. We've partnered with Good On You — an independent agency that rates how brands perform in relation to their impact on the planet, people and animals, with a multi-criteria rating simplified to a five points scale. In order to be awarded our conscious label, larger brands need to score a minimum of four out of five ('Good'), while smaller brands must score at least three out of five ('It's a start'). This item comes from a brand rated four out of five ('Good') by Good on You at the time it was added on FARFETCH. Please note, this is a brand-level rating and does not guarantee that this product is made with conscious materials. Learn more about what makes a product Conscious on our Conscious Criteria page

products.name: Iqushion Mens Leather Cross Slides
products.brandedName: FitFlop Iqushion Mens Leather Cross Slides
products.description: This refined take on our popular iQushion slide, in soft leather with cork in the sole, is a versatile warm-weather staple – ideal for laidback weekends/holidays but smart enough for around the city or a relaxed workplace. Wide criss-cross straps are set on a sleek sole. All-leather linings feel soft against your feet, and a debossed logo on the top strap gives subtle branding. On our featherlight pressure-diffusing iQushion™ midsole: ergonomically shaped, high-rebound, air-foam cushioning – with front-and-back impact pillows, and contoured footbeds for natural arch support – delivering amazing walk-all-day comfort. (Here moulded with a cork rim, for extra style and more use of natural materials, while keeping the soft light iQushion feel.) The addition of rubber outsoles enhances grip and durability. Choose from timeless colours. The iQushion midsole on these is 80% EVA foam/20% cork.

These are an easy option for any warm-weather look, versatile enough to take you from day to night and dressy enough for summer weddings, too.
